verify_cmd: rg -n "_appSettings\\.webPort|_appSettings\\.webServiceWakeLock|Web 服务（未启用）|未启用（当前" lib/features/settings/views/other_settings_view.dart && ! rg -n "WebService\\.start|WebService\\.stop|saveWebPort|saveWebServiceWakeLock" lib/features/settings/views/other_settings_view.dart && dart format --output=none --set-exit-if-changed lib/features/settings/views/other_settings_view.dart
